Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Trapper \Trap"per\, n. [From {Trap} to insnare.] 1. One who traps animals; one who makes a business of trapping animals for their furs. --W. Irving. [1913 Webster]
2. (Mining) A boy who opens and shuts a trapdoor in a gallery or level. --Raymond. [1913 Webster]
trapper n : someone who sets traps for animals (usually to obtain their furs)
